field.name: summary
field.value: Update the iBatisNet Facility to newer iBatis version

field.name: description
field.value:
After working with the iBatisNet facility in a project I am porting I've come to need a newer version.
In the end I updated the facility to adhere to coding standards, and use the newer DomSqlMapBuilder. The tests now run through Nunit-Gui and the build script. I've additionally updated the facilities.build in my patch to include the facility.
The one note which can be viewed as a negative is that the IBatis libraries I've included are of a non official subversion release (a new release build). This was done to reflect the project from which I am porting using the new IBatis library and in turn the newer DTD's.
